value:
$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi2000|Princess Eir, must you return to Hel?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes. I am the daughter of the ruler of
the dead. I have no choice but return
to her realm.$k$pBut whatever information I can pass
you, I will—about my mother's plans
for battle, and how to track her down.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You would risk that much for us?
She knows you are here. Surely her
suspicions are already aroused.$k$pIf those suspicions are confirmed...
She will torture you...even kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What happens to me...
It doesn't matter.$k$pWhat happens to you...
That matters—to me.$k$pYou are my friends. I won't see you
hurt. And so, I...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I thank you, Princess Eir, but I cannot
let you risk yourself like that.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why not?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It is true that your aid could help
us win this war.$k$pBut I would not see you sacrifice
yourself to that victory.$k$pWho would I be if I cast aside
those who are struggling? That
includes you, Princess.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Prince Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The fact of the matter is, things
will be fine. We know the way of
this fight.$k$pAnd we know how to win it—
we ALL share the burden.$k$pPlease, trust me. When this war
ends, we will all be celebrating...
Together.$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Together? Celebrating? Heh. If only
it had gone so well.$k$pNo, Alfonse, you cannot be saved...
Not by anyone.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|I knew you'd come, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It was inevitable, wasn't it...Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Indeed.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Our fight is over. It is up to us to
acknowledge that and end this.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No.$k$pMy struggle will never end.$k$pAlfonse... There is one thing above
all that you do not understand yet.$k$pShall I explain it to you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Why not?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Defeat.$k$pYou have yet to drink deeply
of defeat.$k$pI have tasted it. I have had far more
than my share. It disgusts me.$k$pI will not be defeated again. I cannot
tolerate it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Struggling will get you nowhere.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|So you say. But you may not have
considered this... We are playing
different games.$k$pTo win, you must defeat Hel, and
you must survive your fight.$k$pBut I? All I need is for you to die.
I need not survive. What happens
to my body is of no consequence.$k$pMy path to victory is much less steep
than yours. And I have contemplated
this for some time, Alfonse.$k$pSince my world was destroyed, and
I entered into my contract with Hel,
I knew I might one day fight you...$k$pHere, in this very castle.$k$pOh yes. I've thought long and hard
about it. And I've had plenty of time
to rig up some defenses.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?$k$pRetreat! Immediately! Get out of here
now!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Oh, it's too late for that.$k$pOrder of Heroes... When this castle
collapses into rubble, it will form
your cairn.$k$p$Sbs1000|$SspSE_EFFECT_PRE_BREATH|$Fo3000,128,128,128,255|
